tw-cooking-recipe3+cut-paplho1xUDnvIRKO..recipe:
Recipe #1
---------
Gather all following ingredients and follow the directions to prepare this tasty meal.

Ingredients:
  red apple
  red onion
  yellow bell pepper

Directions:
  dice the red onion
  fry the red onion
  chop the yellow bell pepper
  fry the yellow bell pepper
  prepare meal
walkthrough: chop yellow bell pepper with knife

messages.content:
You are the player of a text-based cooking game.

These are the important game entities: 
cookbook:       Cookbook that contains the recipe.
<ingredient>:   Ingredient you can take, drop, cut, or cook according to the recipe.
<container>:    Container you can open, which can contain ingredients.
<door>:         Door you can open.
knife:          Knife to slice, dice, chop ingredients.
stove:          Stove to fry ingredients.
oven:           Oven to roast ingredients.
bbq:            BBQ to grill ingredients.
meal:           Meal you can eat.

These are the commands to interact with the game:
look
open <container>
close <container>
open <door>
close <door>
inventory
take <ingredient>
take knife
read cookbook
slice <ingredient> with knife
dice <ingredient> with knife
chop <ingredient> with knife
cook <ingredient> with stove    (fry an ingredient)
cook <ingredient> with oven     (roast an ingredient)
cook <ingredient> with bbq      (grill an ingredient)
prepare meal
eat meal

This is the basic game process:
Navigate to the kitchen and read the cookbook.
Take all ingredients according to the recipe.
Follow the recipe.
Eat the meal.

Your main task:
You provide answers to game engine queries following the command templates and game process above.
Never provide answers deviating from the command templates above - unless explicitly asked by the game engine.
Provide only one command at a time - unless the game engine explicitly asks to do something else.

# Current game state:
## ________  ________  __    __  ________        
                   |        \|        \|  \  |  \|        \       
                    \$$$$$$$$| $$$$$$$$| $$  | $$ \$$$$$$$$       
                      | $$   | $$__     \$$\/  $$   | $$          
                      | $$   | $$  \     >$$  $$    | $$          
                      | $$   | $$$$$    /  $$$$\    | $$          
                      | $$   | $$_____ |  $$ \$$\   | $$          
                      | $$   | $$     \| $$  | $$   | $$          
                       \$$    \$$$$$$$$ \$$   \$$    \$$

             |  \  _  |  \ /      \ |       \ |  \      |       \ 
             | $$ / \ | $$|  $$$$$$\| $$$$$$$\| $$      | $$$$$$$\
             | $$/  $\| $$| $$  | $$| $$__| $$| $$      | $$  | $$
             | $$  $$$\ $$| $$  | $$| $$    $$| $$      | $$  | $$
             | $$ $$\$$\$$| $$  | $$| $$$$$$$\| $$      | $$  | $$
             | $$$$  \$$$$| $$__/ $$| $$  | $$| $$_____ | $$__/ $$

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. An ordinary kind of place.

You make out an opened fridge. The fridge contains a raw pork chop. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's an oven. You can make out a table. The table is massive. On the table you make out a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You see a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. On the counter you can make out a cookbook. You see a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You move on, clearly done caring about TextWorld.

## You have not read the recipe yet.

## You are carrying:
  a fried red onion
  a fried yellow bell pepper
  a red apple
  a red hot pepper
  a white onion
  a raw yellow potato
  a black pepper

You can make out a table. The table is massive. On the table you make out a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You see a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. On the counter you can make out a cookbook. You see a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You move on, clearly done caring about TextWorld.
